content.raw: Yep - will have to add BLACS, labscript\_utils, labscript\_devices dependencies once they are packages that can be depended on, and a run-time check on whether a labscript suite ‘profile’ has been created \(though that runtime check will probably be in labsript\_utils rather than runviewer\) - the idea being that you will install packages and then run a command to set up a ‘profile’ containing labconfig, userlib, etc. See [here](#!/labscript_suite/installer/issues/31/tasks-required-before-moving-to-standard) for details.
